Body:
data = nk.data('bio_resting_5min_100hz')
df, info = nk.ecg_process(data['ECG'], sampling_rate=100)
columns = ['ECG_Rate_Mean', 'HRV_RMSSD', 'HRV_MeanNN', 'HRV_SDNN',
    'HRV_SDSD', 'HRV_CVNN', 'HRV_CVSD', 'HRV_MedianNN', 'HRV_MadNN',
    'HRV_MCVNN', 'HRV_IQRNN', 'HRV_pNN50', 'HRV_pNN20', 'HRV_TINN',
    'HRV_HTI', 'HRV_ULF', 'HRV_VLF', 'HRV_LF', 'HRV_HF', 'HRV_VHF',
    'HRV_LFHF', 'HRV_LFn', 'HRV_HFn', 'HRV_LnHF', 'HRV_SD1', 'HRV_SD2',
    'HRV_SD1SD2', 'HRV_S', 'HRV_CSI', 'HRV_CVI', 'HRV_CSI_Modified',
    'HRV_PIP', 'HRV_IALS', 'HRV_PSS', 'HRV_PAS', 'HRV_ApEn', 'HRV_SampEn',
    'HRV_GI', 'HRV_SI', 'HRV_AI', 'HRV_PI', 'HRV_C1d', 'HRV_C1a',
    'HRV_SD1d', 'HRV_SD1a', 'HRV_C2d', 'HRV_C2a', 'HRV_SD2d', 'HRV_SD2a',
    'HRV_Cd', 'HRV_Ca', 'HRV_SDNNd', 'HRV_SDNNa']
features_df = nk.ecg_intervalrelated(df, sampling_rate=100)
assert all(features_df == nk.ecg_analyze(df, sampling_rate=100, method=
    'interval-related'))
assert all(elem in np.array(features_df.columns.values, dtype=str) for elem in
    columns)
assert features_df.shape[0] == 1
epochs = nk.epochs_create(df, events=[0, 15000], sampling_rate=100,
    epochs_end=150)
features_dict = nk.ecg_intervalrelated(epochs, sampling_rate=100)
assert all(elem in columns for elem in np.array(features_dict.columns.
    values, dtype=str))
assert features_dict.shape[0] == 2
